Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Packages
  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Annotation Types
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Packages 
    Package Description
    org.gradle.api.dsl
    This package will be removed in Gradle 5.0.
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface Description
    org.gradle.api.tasks.CompatibilityAdapterForTaskInputs
    The interface is only here to allow plugins built against Gradle <4.3 to run and it will be removed in Gradle 6.0.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.CompilerArgumentProvider
    Use CommandLineArgumentProvider directly.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.quality.FindBugsReports
    FindBugs is unmaintained and does not support bytecode compiled for Java 9 and above.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.quality.FindBugsXmlReport
    FindBugs is unmaintained and does not support bytecode compiled for Java 9 and above.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.quality.JDependReports
    JDepend is unmaintained and does not support bytecode compiled for Java 8 and above.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.osgi.OsgiManifest
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class Description
    org.gradle.api.plugins.announce.AnnouncePlugin
    This plugin will be removed in the next major version.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.announce.AnnouncePluginExtension
    org.gradle.api.plugins.announce.BuildAnnouncementsPlugin
    This plugin will be removed in the next major version.
    org.gradle.api.dsl.ConventionProperty
    This class will be removed in Gradle 5.0.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.quality.FindBugs
    FindBugs is unmaintained and does not support bytecode compiled for Java 9 and above.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.quality.FindBugsExtension
    FindBugs is unmaintained and does not support bytecode compiled for Java 9 and above.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.quality.FindBugsPlugin
    FindBugs is unmaintained and does not support bytecode compiled for Java 9 and above.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.quality.JDepend
    JDepend is unmaintained and does not support bytecode compiled for Java 8 and above.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.quality.JDependExtension
    JDepend is unmaintained and does not support bytecode compiled for Java 8 and above.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.quality.JDependPlugin
    JDepend is unmaintained and does not support bytecode compiled for Java 8 and above.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.osgi.OsgiPlugin
    org.gradle.api.plugins.osgi.OsgiPluginConvention
  • Deprecated Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type Description
    org.gradle.api.Nullable
    Use Nullable instead.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field Description
    org.gradle.api.plugins.JavaPlugin.COMPILE_CONFIGURATION_NAME
    Users should prefer JavaPlugin.API_CONFIGURATION_NAME or JavaPlugin.IMPLEMENTATION_CONFIGURATION_NAME.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.JavaPlugin.RUNTIME_CONFIGURATION_NAME
    Consumers should use JavaPlugin.RUNTIME_ELEMENTS_CONFIGURATION_NAME instead.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.JavaPlugin.TEST_RUNTIME_CONFIGURATION_NAME
    Use JavaPlugin.TEST_RUNTIME_CLASSPATH_CONFIGURATION_NAME instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method Description
    org.gradle.api.plugins.PluginCollection.add(T)
    Use PluginManager.apply(Class) instead.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.PluginCollection.addAll(Collection<? extends T>)
    Use PluginManager.apply(Class) instead.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.PluginCollection.clear()
    plugins cannot be removed.
    org.gradle.testing.jacoco.plugins.JacocoPlugin.configureDefaultOutputPathForJacocoMerge()
    This method will be made private in a future version of Gradle.
    org.gradle.api.file.ProjectLayout.directoryProperty()
    Replaced by ObjectFactory.directoryProperty()
    org.gradle.api.file.ProjectLayout.directoryProperty(Provider<? extends Directory>)
    Replaced by ObjectFactory.directoryProperty()
    org.gradle.api.file.ProjectLayout.fileProperty()
    Replaced by ObjectFactory.fileProperty()
    org.gradle.api.file.ProjectLayout.fileProperty(Provider<? extends RegularFile>)
    Replaced by ObjectFactory.fileProperty()
    org.gradle.api.artifacts.result.ComponentSelectionReason.getDescription()
    Use ComponentSelectionReason.getDescriptions() instead
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.JavaCompile.getEffectiveAnnotationProcessorPath()
    Use CompileOptions.getAnnotationProcessorPath() instead.
    org.gradle.language.scala.tasks.AbstractScalaCompile.getEffectiveAnnotationProcessorPath()
    Use CompileOptions.getAnnotationProcessorPath() instead.
    org.gradle.tooling.model.idea.IdeaContentRoot.getGeneratedSourceDirectories()
    Use IdeaContentRoot.getSourceDirectories() in combination with IdeaSourceDirectory.isGenerated() instead.
    org.gradle.tooling.model.idea.IdeaContentRoot.getGeneratedTestDirectories()
    Use IdeaContentRoot.getTestDirectories() in combination with IdeaSourceDirectory.isGenerated() instead.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.ExtensionContainer.getSchema()
    org.gradle.testing.jacoco.plugins.JacocoTaskExtension.isAppend()
    The Jacoco plugin now deletes the old coverage file before task execution, so the data will never be appended to an existing coverage file from another task. Use JacocoMerge to merge different execution files or use JacocoReportBase.setExecutionData(FileCollection) to generate a report from multiple execution files at once. Append is set to true for the agent since this allows multiple JVMs spawned by one task to write to the same JacocoTaskExtension.destinationFile.
    org.gradle.StartParameter.isInteractive()
    This flag is no longer used and simply defaults to 'false'.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.SourceSetOutput.isLegacyLayout()
    This method always returns false starting from Gradle 5.0.
    org.gradle.StartParameter.isRecompileScripts()
    This flag is no longer used.
    org.gradle.api.artifacts.repositories.IvyArtifactRepository.layout(String, Closure)
    use IvyArtifactRepository.layout(String) or IvyArtifactRepository.patternLayout(Action)
    org.gradle.api.artifacts.repositories.IvyArtifactRepository.layout(String, Action<? extends RepositoryLayout>)
    use IvyArtifactRepository.layout(String) or IvyArtifactRepository.patternLayout(Action)
    org.gradle.api.DefaultTask.newInputDirectory()
    Replaced by ObjectFactory.directoryProperty()
    org.gradle.api.DefaultTask.newInputFile()
    Replaced by ObjectFactory.fileProperty()
    org.gradle.api.DefaultTask.newOutputDirectory()
    Replaced by ObjectFactory.directoryProperty()
    org.gradle.api.DefaultTask.newOutputFile()
    Replaced by ObjectFactory.fileProperty()
    org.gradle.api.plugins.PluginCollection.remove(Object)
    plugins cannot be removed.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.PluginCollection.removeAll(Collection<?>)
    plugins cannot be removed.
    org.gradle.testing.jacoco.tasks.JacocoReportBase.setAdditionalClassDirs(FileCollection)
    Use getAdditionalClassDirs().setFrom(...)
    org.gradle.testing.jacoco.tasks.JacocoReportBase.setAdditionalSourceDirs(FileCollection)
    Use getAdditionalSourceDirs().setFrom(...)
    org.gradle.testing.jacoco.plugins.JacocoTaskExtension.setAppend(boolean)
    org.gradle.testing.jacoco.tasks.JacocoReportBase.setClassDirectories(FileCollection)
    Use getClassDirectories().setFrom(...)
    org.gradle.testing.jacoco.tasks.JacocoReportBase.setExecutionData(FileCollection)
    Use getExecutionData().setFrom(...)
    org.gradle.StartParameter.setInteractive(boolean)
    This flag is no longer used.
    org.gradle.StartParameter.setRecompileScripts(boolean)
    This flag is no longer used and simply defaults to 'false'.
    org.gradle.testing.jacoco.tasks.JacocoReportBase.setSourceDirectories(FileCollection)
    Use getSourceDirectories().setFrom(...)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    org.gradle.api.plugins.osgi.OsgiPluginConvention(ProjectInternal)
    Creating instances of this class is deprecated. These should be created by the OSGi plugin only.
